meanings.definition: To remove toxins from the body.
meanings.sent1: After a long run, drinking water helps in detoxicating the body.
meanings.sent2: She detoxicates her skin by using natural products.
meanings.sent3: The detoxicating smoothie tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude detoxicates the negativity around him.
meanings.sent5: Detoxicating the mind is just as important as detoxicating the body.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to cleanse or purify.
meanings.sent1: The detoxicating tea leaves a refreshing feeling.
meanings.sent2: The detoxicating properties of the plant are well-known.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a detoxicating superhero after her workout.
meanings.sent4: The detoxicating power of nature is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The detoxicating effects of laughter are underestimated.
